TopicTitle: Nik Kruger Sciences, where is it?

Articles.Content:
So this Halloween Mr. Me's Rocket Plane and Subasembly Shop, dormant since June, announced that by the end of November it would become Nik Kruger Sciences. Well... it's mid-December and there's still no NKS thread. What gives?! The reason for the delay is difficultly on getting the new internet connection. There is currently some complex monetary problems in my family, and so we haven't been able to get ATI Internet yet. There is no ETA for the NKS relaunch. Thanks for your patience.

 

If this belongs in Spacecraft Exchange please tell me.

 

-Nik J. Kruger, NKS CEO.

Pretty sure it does belong in the Spacecraft Exchange forum.

Although I'm not familiar with your original thread or your rocket design company, I'm sorry to hear about your recent problems...My computer recently died and I'm not monetarily well off enough to rush out and purchase a new one so I can relate to your situation a little.

Hope everything get's better for you and your family!
